-1.title: Ghost Spotted! HOLY CRAP!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: We Moved Into a Haunted House

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: In the debut episode, Sunshine Girl, who's interested in the paranormal, says she hopes to capture "creepy sketchy stuff" going on in her home, if only to prove the fact to her mother.

2.title: Showing You My Haunted House

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sunshine Girl shows off her room, books, desk, typewriter, her dog Orson, and promises lots of "taxidermy stuff" in her "slightly creepy home."

3.title: Meet My Mom at the Haunted House

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Sunshine Girl introduces her mother Kat, and shows off the office, balcony, kitchen, dining room, living room, backyard, and "creepy as all get-out" stairs of her home.

9.title: Meeting Creepy Lady

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: The first appearance of "Creepy Lady" on the front walk . . . and then she's gone.

23.title: Creepy Lady Speaks!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: The Creepy Lady shows up at the door when Sunshine Girl is home alone, and warns her that the house is not safe and she should leave.

38.title: Ten Random Facts About ME!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

38.plot: Sunshine Girl shares ten random facts about herself, which include her interest in narwhals, Vampire Weekend, and Jane Austen's "Pride and Prejudice."

40.title: Ghost at Old Fort

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

40.plot: Sunshine Girl and Kat explore an old fort with cannons, historic furniture and clothing, jail, and maybe a ghost or two.

47.title: Field Trip to a Ruin

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

47.plot: Sunshine and her mom go on a field trip to the ruin of a caretaker's cottage in the woods that is rumored to be haunted.

50.title: SCARY! DON'T WATCH! Ghost Child

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

50.plot: The power in the house suddenly goes out, Sunshine and Kat hear the calling of a child, and find shocking evidence on the back of the bathroom door.

52.title: Creepy Lady Enters My House!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

52.plot: Creepy Lady appears again, outside the house - then inside the house, with a box that she hands to Sunshine, saying, "I have something for you - It will protect you - You must never open it."

57.title: We Open the Box...

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

57.plot: Pressured by her mom and bothered by its really bad smell, Sunshine Girl opens the mysterious box left by the Creepy Lady. The contents are shocking . . . and then the power goes out.

64.title: Horrific Ghost Child Caught on Tape!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

64.plot: A little girl's voice calls, whispers, and screams from the baby monitor in the living room. Then Sunshine goes upstairs and finds the second baby monitor has moved, and then she SEES the ghost girl.

65.title: Update to Scary Ghost Child Caught on Tape Video!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

65.plot: Having recovered (a bit) from her scare, Sunshine decides the ghost girl is real and is probably the girl in the mysterious photo of the two people with bags over their heads. But why?

70.title: Ouija Board Brings Haunting of Ghosts

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

70.plot: Sunshine and Kat open a Ouija board they bought at the store, wondering whether it might help them identify the ghosts in the house.

78.title: Girl Attacked by Ghost

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

78.plot: Paranormal activity ratchets way up: doorknobs rattle, doors open, the drawers and oven are open in the kitchen - and when Sunshine is lured out into the yard, the ghost girl locks the door behind her.

81.title: Creepy Lady to the Rescue

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

81.plot: Creepy Lady comes into Sunshine's home to help fight the ghost invasion.

87.title: Ten Random Facts About Me ... Part Deux!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

87.plot: For a second time, Sunshine reveals some interesting things about herself, from biology and sewing to "Angry Birds," business cards, Pandora, and gluten.

1.title: My Mom and I Head Out on a Road Trip!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Sunshine and Kat head out on a beach road trip to investigate potential ghost activity on the Oregon Coast.

2.title: On the Road to Find Ghosts...

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: On the road to the Oregon Coast, Sunshine and Kat trade shifts driving. They pass a Wendy's which is probably not haunted. There's a constant refrain of "Are we there yet?"

3.title: A Haunted Hotel

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Sunshine and Kat finally arrive at the ocean. They're in Lincoln City, Oregon, but Kat hasn't revealed where they're staying. It's not the Lincoln City Inn, not D Sands Motel, and not the Hideaway Inn. . . .

4.title: We arrive at the haunted hotel!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Sunshine and Kat finally arrive at the Historic Anchor Inn in Lincoln City, which research on the Internet has suggested might be haunted.

5.title: Checking Out the Historic Anchor Inn

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The inn clearly has a lot of character; there are human figures, maps, old movie posters, and a lot of other eclectic stuff cluttering the lobby, halls, and rooms. And there's a lovely sun room at one end.

6.title: Our Haunted Hotel Room

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Kat requested their "most haunted room." Sunshine has trouble with the key to the room called "Lillian," but once they're inside, it's musty, creepy, and very cool. There's a pump organ and a Goya print on the wall, among other things.

7.title: Exploring the Haunted Hotel

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Sunshine and Kat explore the rest of the motel: communal rooms, long hallways, peeks in the other open private rooms. Downstairs is another communal room with a lot of odd clutter.

18.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 1

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: In search of her father's house, Sunshine drives down a long gravel and dirt road, and comes to a house overgrown with foliage. It doesn't look like anyone lives there, but armed with the locket, Sunshine goes over to investigate.

19.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 2

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Sunshine knocks on the door of the overgrown house, but no one answers. She walks around the perimeter, finds an old shed out back, then peers in a window and sees lots of old stuff inside.

20.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 3

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Inside the house are piles of crazy old stuff: boxes, books, lots of empty jars, an old typewriter and radio, even a book labeled "Family Record" - but nothing's recorded in it.

21.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 4

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: The only place left is the basement, which is pretty dark but Sunshine has a flashlight. Then she sees something and goes racing out.

22.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 5

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Racing out of the house, Sunshine realizes she dropped the locket somewhere, but then a mysterious man appears and jumps on her car. She guns the engine and he flips over the top of the vehicle.

23.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 6

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Trapped with the mystery man between her and her car, Sunshine runs into the empty house and locks the door behind her. But where can she go next?

24.title: Worst Day Ever, Part 7

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: The mystery man is in the house with her. He has a bag over his head, but then pulls it off and chases Sunshine. She runs out of the house and gets to her car.

25.title: Follow Up to the Worst Day Ever

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Sunshine reports that she called the police, who came to the house and didn't find anything. Apparently the house is owned by people back East; maybe the guy who was creeping around was the owner.

32.title: A Ghost Expert?

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

32.plot: Sunshine meets a reputed expert in the paranormal at a local park and shows him the mysterious picture of the man and the child to get his opinion.

33.title: Creepy Lady and Mom

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

33.plot: Sunshine reports that Creepy Lady has been spotted again. Mom is acting weird: she says they will stay in the house and she doesn't think there are any ghosts on the premises.

39.title: A Worrisome Call

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

39.plot: LeMaster calls to say Sunshine is in grave danger; "there is a haunting at play."

40.title: The Visit from the Medium, Part 1

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

40.plot: In an effort to learn more about the powers that haunt her home, Sunshine consults Alister Turnbull, noted expert in the paranormal.

41.title: The Visit from the Medium, Part 2

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

41.plot: Alister Turnbull explains about the lower auras of the spirit world and how spirits attempt to reach higher levels. But in order to find out whether there is potential trickery here or a real haunting, he must investigate further.

42.title: A Visit from the Medium, Part 3

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

42.plot: Alister Turnbull senses dark and sinister energy in the house. He can see two figures; "they're sightless, and yet they're looking over you." (Sunshine thinks he's weird.) Suddenly he rushes to the bathroom.

43.title: Paranormal Medium Hurt by GHOST!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

43.plot: Turnbull is in the bathroom 10 or 20 minutes before he comes out with a bloody mouth. The restroom sink is bloody too. "Don't trust her," he repeatedly warns Sunshine about her mother. Kat throws him out of the house.

44.title: Update on the Paranormal Expert

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

44.plot: LeMaster, the paranormal expert who left the panicked voice mail (Kat calls him "the Idiot Guy"), has agreed to meet Sunshine again later in the day.

45.title: A CULT? What?!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

45.plot: LeMaster says the photo links to a cult from the 1800s. It fears a demon that demands the sacrifice of a first-born daughter. Squelched by the police in the 1930s, the cult resurfaces occasionally. "Please do not call me again," he says.

46.title: Leaving the Occult Expert

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

46.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

47.title: Asking Mom About the CULT

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

47.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

57.title: Poltergeist activity!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

57.plot: Sunshine introduces "Uncle Tommy," who explains he's not really her uncle, but he grew up with Kat and lived in Sydney - when another plate crashes in the kitchen.

58.title: Mom Is Possessed by the Demon

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

58.plot: Uncle Tommy tries to bring Kat out of her trance by recounting past experiences they had together, but nothing seems to have any effect on her.

59.title: Going to Sacrifice Myself to the Demon

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

59.plot: Sunshine decides to go to the forest with Victoria at night and perform the ritual to save her Mom.

60.title: About to do the sacrifice

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

60.plot: Sunshine is in the forest at night with Victoria, who says she will banish the demon when it appears.

61.title: DEMON Sacrifice Filmed!

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

61.plot: Stormy rain hits. Victoria has Sunshine kneel with a bag over her head; then Victoria picks up a knife. There's lightning, a growl, and something attacks Victoria. A man pulls the bag off Sunshine's head and says "they are releasing her."

62.title: Recovering

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

62.plot: Wrapped in a blanket, Sunshine reports that everyone's okay. "My name is Frances Jones, but I go by Jonesy."

66.title: Uncle Tommy Tells Mom's Secrets

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

66.plot: Ready to return to Australia tomorrow, Uncle Tommy reveals that Kat once thought she had been abducted by aliens. She disappeared for two years, then turned up with a year-old child.

1.title: What Happens Now?

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: At the start of a new season, Sunshine asks viewers what they think she should do next. She asks for votes on the matter.

2.title: Should I Try to Contact My Dad?

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sunshine begins to wonder whether her Dad has had something to do with all the weird things that have happened recently.

6.title: Ten Random Facts About Nolan

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Nolan unenthusiastically agrees to share ten random facts about himself, including that he never learned to drive, has lived in 41 different homes, is a good cook and avid reader, and has a slight but abiding interest in the paranormal.

1.title: I've Had Some Time to Think...

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Sunshine rewatched the sacrifice video to verify that it's Victoria in it. Why is Victoria so open about Sunshine and Kat not trusting her anymore? Sunshine asks for viewers' opinions.

2.title: The Paranormal World of Sunshine

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sunshine discusses a chart she's made of the paranormal hierarchy. She is a Luiseach, she believes; is her Dad, as well? Then there are Protectors, Mentors, Awakens, Markons, and Groundlings. . . .

3.title: Psychokinesis Ghosts Caught on Camera - Haunting Evidence

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Victoria asks Sunshine whether she trusts her. Sunshine admits she does not. Victoria asks to be sacrificed.

13.title: Teen Ghost Hunters - New Mentor

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: A possible new mentor tells Sunshine the machine won't save her from the Markon: this demon is after Anna as well as her. He'll bring in some new ghosts to train.

32.title: Goodbye Anna - Leaving the Ghost Behind

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

32.plot: Kat is determined to move to a different house, so Sunshine makes one last attempt to speak to Anna. Uncle Tommy is on hand to help.

1.title: Caught on Camera? - On the Road with Haunted Sunshine Girl

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Time for another road trip. To celebrate Sunshine's graduation, she and Kat head to the Oregon Coast again, but this time to a cabin in the woods north of where they went last time. They're hoping to avoid a haunted place for once.

2.title: Paranormal Activity in Creepy Cabin in Woods?

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sunshine and Kat take of the tour of the cabin, which seems pretty neat . . . and then they hear a rattle downstairs.

3.title: Sighting in Creepy Cabin

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Nolan's Mom Knows of a Haunted House

episode of.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Marcie, the mother of one of Sunshine's friends, Nolan, calls and says she knows about a house that's got some kind of powerful presence and might interest our heroine. So Sunshine goes over to Nolan's house to find out more.

imdb.plot outline: Follows a teenage girl, Sunshine, as she experiences paranormal adventures in her home and other locations. Along the way she befriends many others who help her come into her powers and perceptions, such as Victoria, who mentors her powers and may or may not be a ghostly figure. Her mother Kat and Uncle Tommy are also a big part in her life and adventures - as well as her best pal, Nolan, who had a near-death experience and can see paranormal activities as well.
imdb.title: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl
akas: The Haunting of Sunshine Girl (United States)
plot: Follows a teenage girl, Sunshine, as she experiences paranormal adventures in her home and other locations. Along the way she befriends many others who help her come into her powers and perceptions, such as Victoria, who mentors her powers and may or may not be a ghostly figure. Her mother Kat and Uncle Tommy are also a big part in her life and adventures - as well as her best pal, Nolan, who had a near-death experience and can see paranormal activities as well.::JXW

The haunting of sunshine girl follows a teenage girl, Sunshine, as she has paranormal adventures in her home and visiting locations. Along the way she befriends many others who help her come into her powers and perceptions, such as Victoria who may or may not be a ghostly figure. Her mother, Kat and Uncle Tommy are also a big part in her life and adventures. As well as her best pal, Nolan, who had a near death experience and can see the paranormal as well. By:JXW::JXW
